pages.text: $(#630000)The Vigilant Bone is a Guandao Blade Material resembling a Pure Parasite, and serves as a direct upgrade to the Reformed Bone. The blade it creates has no Tier requirement, nor does it cap Tag Damage.

$(#630000)This material is not superceded, and serves as the highest tier of blade currently obtainable. At this point, the only way to further improve the weapon will likely be a better coating, barring enchantments and related mechanics.
